title: Science Document Analysis Competency Development Course Utilizing Reverse Sequential Reading Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific reading comprehension and understanding of technical terminology
context.additional_context: Asynchronous online program designed to help current practitioners efficiently analyze work-related scientific documents.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze detailed elements of scientific texts in reverse order and explain associations between core topics with 80% accuracy
Learners can reconstruct the context of detailed data (statistics, terminology, experimental procedures) within documents with 90% accuracy through three or more reverse-reading exercises

Learners can derive key conclusions and prepare practical application plans in one-page report format after analyzing science case study documents from summative feedback using reverse-reading strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
